channel.title: Brutal-PK || FULL SPAWN || PK based only || 317 || Join today
channel.description:
[center][img]http://brutal-pk.org/community/Themes/InsidiousV1-u/images/theme/logo.png[/img]
[B]ABOUT BRUTAL-PK[/B] Hello Guest and welcome to Brutal-PK [B]Brutal-PK[/B] is a full spawn server where you gain PK points and with the PK points you buy rights to wear certain items we do not have economy at all expect our PK point based economy. Welcome and we hope you a pleasant stay with us.
[u]Features: [/u] -PKing?
[b]Links:[/b] [url=http://www.brutal-pk.org]Website[/url] [url=http://www.brutal-pk.org/Brutal-PK.jar]Download[/url]
[b]Media:[/b]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bpk2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bpk3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bpk4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bpk5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bpk1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/asdf.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/asdff.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bse.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/bser.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/hails.png[/img]
[B]MORE MEDIA LATER.[/B] [/center]
